column6: "Never After" â€" SPECIAL OVERSIZED ISSUE!  Trapped in time, lost in space, with alien threats forever on the attack, and Paradise just outside his reach...   ...what terrible price will the Surfer pay to fulfill his most selfless promise? A twist on a Sci-Fi classic that could only be told through sequential art.   Forget "sideways issues" and "silent issues", Slott & Allred are bringing you a modern-day Marvel comic you'll be talking about for years to come.
